description: Yorkshire sign New Zealand international fast bowler Will O'Rourke for the first eight matches of the T20 Blast.
title: Will O'Rourke: Yorkshire sign fast bowler for T20 Blast
title_page: Will O'Rourke: Yorkshire sign fast bowler for T20 Blast - BBC Sport
maintext:
Yorkshire have signed New Zealand fast bowler Will O'Rourke for the first eight matches of the 2025 T20 Blast.
The 23-year-old has taken 36 wickets in 10 Tests for the Black Caps, including the best-ever match figures for a New Zealand Test debutant of 9-93 against South Africa.
"I spoke with Kane [Williamson] about the prospect of signing for Yorkshire and he was effusive in his praise for the club and the supporters," the right-armer told the club website.
"Everyone around the world knows of Yorkshire CCC and I'll be proud to wear the white rose when I arrive."
